allow: Bash(powershell -Command "(Get-Content ''src/components/CreateProblemModal.tsx'') -replace ''fixed inset-4 md:inset-auto md:top-1/2 md:left-1/2 md:-translate-x-1/2 md:-translate-y-1/2 md:w-\[800px\] md:max-h-\[85vh\]'', ''fixed top-1/2 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-[90%] max-w-[800px] max-h-[85vh]'' | Set-Content ''src/components/CreateProblemModal.tsx''")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Code Dojo - Electron app for coding practice

Features:
- Dashboard, Notes, Problems, Practice, Settings views
- Master-Detail layout with collapsible sidebar
- Folder organization for notes and problems
- Code execution for TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, C++, Java, Go, Rust
- Monaco Editor with Vim mode support
- Submission history tracking
- Dark theme UI
